title: Listen to ‘The Daily’
content: The New York Times surveyed all 50 states for their estimates of how much coronavirus vaccine they expect to receive before the end of 2020.

title: Got a confidential news tip?
content: Doses are being packed at Pfizer’s Michigan plant. A C.D.C. panel endorsed the vaccine and will issue guidance for pregnant women. Here’s the latest.

title: Listen to ‘Sway’ With Kara Swisher
content: The Supreme Court repudiation of President Trump was also a blunt rebuke to Republican leaders who had put their interests ahead of the country’s.

title: U.S. Begins Staggering Effort to Get Vaccines to States
content: A Trump appointee in Milwaukee dismissed a suit contesting the election with a withering rebuke, ruling that it had failed “as a matter of law and fact.”

title: How Many Doses Will Your State Get?
content: Protesters, including members of the far-right Proud Boys, were incensed by a Supreme Court ruling that dashed President Trump’s election hopes.

title: UPS and FedEx to Ship the First Vaccines on Sunday Morning
content: The pressure on President-elect Joe Biden is intense, even as his efforts to ensure ethnic and gender diversity already go far beyond those of President Trump.

title: How the G.O.P. Tried to Topple a Pillar of Democracy
content: A year ago, Mr. Biden was on a grim bus tour through Iowa, joined by many old friends. Now he wants to bring some of the crew to Washington.

title: Federal Judge in Wisconsin Deals Trump Another Defeat
content: The critical tweets echoed the president’s attacks on Jeff Sessions, his first attorney general.

title: Thousands of Trump Supporters Protest as Bids to Overturn Vote Fail
content: Gov. Andrew Cuomo made a sharp strategic shift to persuade New Yorkers to take the coronavirus seriously as infections surged across the state.

title: Seeking a Diverse Administration, Biden Finds One Group’s Gain Is Another’s Loss
content: Before the ban on indoor dining in New York City was reinstated, some music clubs had restarted performances, claiming they were background music.

title: Joe Biden’s Iowa Bus Tour Is Headed for a D.C. Reunion
content: He cemented his place in the country pantheon in the 1970s with hits including “Kiss an Angel Good Mornin’” and “Is Anybody Goin’ to San Antone.”

title: Trump Castigates Barr for Not Publicly Disclosing Hunter Biden Inquiry
content: The best actors of 2020. Barack Obama on his memoir. An attempt at counting Australia’s koalas. And more.

title: Cuomo Tries to Jolt Public by Warning of Overwhelmed Hospitals
content: The Biden administration will have the opportunity to restore confidence in America and take on the worsening climate crisis.

title: Piano Bars and Jazz Clubs Reopened, Calling Live Music ‘Incidental’
content: The Supreme Court thwarts the latest Trumpist attack on American democracy.

title: Charley Pride, Country Music’s First Black Superstar, Dies at 86
content: The Senegalese capital has an aura that seeps into the soul. Bustling and addictive, it makes you want to stick around.

title: The Weekender: A Celebrity Pastor’s Fall From Grace
content: Carmen Lynch told the same joke on “The Tonight Show” and an album. It didn’t take off until she made it the subject of a goofy video on TikTok.

title: Did you follow the headlines this week? Try our news quiz.
content: The Year in Pictures project is an annual celebration of photojournalism. In 2020, photographers were living what they captured.
